publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2149 Christina McKelvie: Protecting Asylum-Seeker Children—That the Parliament welcomes the comments of Children’s Commissioner Kathleen Marshall when she said "In Scotland we’re getting some things right … The Scottish Government has spoken out against unacceptable methods of forced removal of children and set a lead in allowing asylum seekers access to further or higher education"; acknowledges her warning that much remains to be done; commits itself to continuing to work to protect the rights of asylum-seeker children, and calls on the Scottish Government to do likewise.
